author: ShortCircuit
description:
Check out the Secretlab Titan Evo ergonomic gaming chair at https://lmg.gg/secretlabsc and give your back the support it deserves!

For $130, you can wear an AI “friend” around your neck. Linus tests its quirks, questions its privacy tradeoffs, and finds out if anyone would actually want one. The reactions in public say a lot about who this device is really for...

Check out Friend: https://lmg.gg/NF27V 

Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at https://lmg.gg/7s34e

► GET MERCH: https://lttstore.com
► GET A VPN: https://www.piavpn.com/ShortCircuit
► GET EXCLUSIVE CONTENT ON FLOATPLANE: https://lmg.gg/lttfloatplane
